page.title: 13EDUCATION
page.content:
Kevin is aged 8 he lives with his parents and his three brothers at Legars house.
7.00am Get up, and go down stairs.Have a cup of tea and have my breakfast. 7.30am Watch TV until its time to go. 8.45am Mrs Greig takes me and my brother (Martin) to school. 9.00am School starts.We do maths, English,Art,PE,Reading,Music,Drama and RE.(Not all in one lesson of course). 10.30am Mrs Phillips class joins us for assembly. 10.45am Play time. 11.00am Lessons restart. 12.15pm Dinner. 12.45pm Dinner playtime. 1.30pm Afternoon lessons begin. 2.30pm Afternoon playtime. 2.45pm Afternoon lessons restart. 3.30pm Home time.
